scripts.syncS3: aws s3 sync ./ s3://universodascartas.com.br --region sa-east-1 --profile universodascartas
scripts.clearCache: export AWS_PAGER=""; aws cloudfront create-invalidation --distribution-id E7O9VTAJJJDNZ --profile universodascartas --paths "/index.html" "/images/*" "/css/*" "/js/*"
scripts.deploy: npm run syncS3 && npm run clearCache
